title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the remote onboarding experience system.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, scalability considerations, and security measures. The architecture should be modular, maintainable, and extensible to accommodate future requirements.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store employee information, onboarding progress, and other relevant data.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend services and APIs for the remote onboarding experience system.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface and frontend components for the remote onboarding experience system.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to security best practices and complies with relevant regulations and policies.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit, integration, and end-to-end testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure, and monitoring for the remote onboarding experience system.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation and training materials for system administrators and end-users.
